definition.en: Indicates that the actor has had a Learner State Attribute predicted by the ITS

prefLabel.en: Predicted

definition.en: clearly show the existence or truth of (something) by giving proof or evidence

prefLabel.en: Demonstrated

definition.en: Indicates that the actor has started a domain session

prefLabel.en: Started

definition.en: Indicates that the actor has ended a domain session

prefLabel.en: Closed

definition.en: Activity indicates that the Learner State Attribute tracked within this statement was categorized as part of the Actor's Affective Learner State

prefLabel.en: Affective Learner State

definition.en: An assessment within a DKF at some level within the hierarchy

prefLabel.en: Assessment Node

definition.en: Activity indicates that the Learner State Attribute tracked within this statement was categorized as part of the Actor's Cognitive Learner State.

prefLabel.en: Cognitive Learner State

definition.en: A DKF concept which is assessed during a domain session and associated with a competency

prefLabel.en: Concept Assessment

definition.en: Activity represents a grouping of assessment results calculated at the end of a DKF instance based on the Actors performance during the instance.

prefLabel.en: Course Record

definition.en: Activity represents the course in which the containing statement was generated

prefLabel.en: Domain

definition.en: Activity represents the instance of the course in which the containing statement was generated

prefLabel.en: Domain Session

definition.en: A collection of Concept Assessements that allows for arbitrary nesting of Concept Assessments

prefLabel.en: Intermediate Concept Assessment

definition.en: Activity represents one of the Learner State Attributes tracked within GIFT

prefLabel.en: Learner State Attribute

definition.en: Activity represents feedback provieded by an Observer regarding the Actor's performance evaluation described by the containing statement

prefLabel.en: Observer Media

definition.en: A possibly heterogeneous collection of Concept Assessment(s) and Intermediate Concept Assessment(s)

prefLabel.en: Task Assessment

definition.en: xAPI Profile containing the concepts, templates and patterns serving as an xAPI Domain Model

Actor's overall performance on an assessment (expected to be associated with one or more externaly defined competencies) derived from all instances of the actor being evaluated on said assessment over some period of time. If the assessment belongs to a hierarchy (has n parent assessment(s)), those parents will be tracked via context extension. The overall grade for the performance assessment is found within result response and the finer grain details are tracked via result extension.

prefLabel.en: Assessed Formative Competency Set

definition.en: Actor's overall performance on an assessment (expected to be associated with one or more externaly defined competencies) derived from all instances of the actor being evaluated on said assessment over some period of time. If the assessment belongs to a hierarchy (has n parent assessment(s)), those parents will be tracked via context extension. The overall grade for the performance assessment is found within result response and the finer grain details are tracked via result extension. The Identifier for the Domain Session in which the evaluations took place is used to create a Grouping contextActivity and set context registration.

prefLabel.en: Assessed Formative Competency Set within Domain Session

definition.en: Actor's overall performance on an assessment (expected to be associated with one or more externaly defined competencies) derived from all instances of the actor being evaluated on said assessment over some period of time. If the assessment belongs to a hierarchy (has n parent assessment(s)), those parents will be tracked via context extension. The overall grade for the performance assessment is found within result response and the finer grain details are tracked via result extension. The Name of the Domain in which the evaluations took place is used to create Parent contextActivity.

prefLabel.en: Assessed Formative Competency Set within Domain

definition.en: Actor's overall performance on an assessment (expected to be associated with one or more externaly defined competencies) derived from all instances of the actor being evaluated on said assessment over some period of time. If the assessment belongs to a hierarchy (has n parent assessment(s)), those parents will be tracked via context extension. The overall grade for the performance assessment is found within result response and the finer grain details are tracked via result extension. The Identifier for the Course Record from which the evaluations are found is used to create a Grouping contextActivity

prefLabel.en: Assessed Formative Competency Set derived from Course Record

definition.en: Actor's overall performance on an assessment (expected to be associated with one or more externaly defined competencies) derived from all instances of the actor being evaluated on said assessment over some period of time. If the assessment belongs to a hierarchy (has n parent assessment(s)), those parents will be tracked via context extension. The overall grade for the performance assessment is found within result response and the finer grain details are tracked via result extension. The Identifier for the Domain Session in which the evaluations took place is used to create a Grouping contextActivity and set context registration. The Name of the Domain in which the evaluations took place is used to create Parent contextActivity.

prefLabel.en: Assessed Formative Competency Set within Domain with known Session

definition.en: Actor's overall performance on an assessment (expected to be associated with one or more externaly defined competencies) derived from all instances of the actor being evaluated on said assessment over some period of time. prefLabel.en: Assessed Formative Competency Set derived from Course Record associated with known Session

definition.en: Actor's overall performance on an assessment (expected to be associated with one or more externaly defined competencies) derived from all instances of the actor being evaluated on said assessment over some period of time. If the assessment belongs to a hierarchy (has n parent assessment(s)), those parents will be tracked via context extension. The overall grade for the performance assessment is found within result response and the finer grain details are tracked via result extension. The Name of the Domain in which the evaluations took place is used to create Parent contextActivity. The Identifier for the Course Record from which the evaluations are found is used to create a Grouping contextActivity

prefLabel.en: Assessed Formative Competency Set derived from Course Record associated with known Domain

definition.en: Actor's overall performance on an assessment (expected to be associated with one or more externaly defined competencies) derived from all instances of the actor being evaluated on said assessment over some period of time. If the assessment belongs to a hierarchy (has n parent assessment(s)), those parents will be tracked via context extension. The overall grade for the performance assessment is found within result response and the finer grain details are tracked via result extension. prefLabel.en: Assessed Formative Competency Set derived from Course Record associated with known Domain and Session
